settings.rich-text: No synthetic fragrance, color, parabens, sulfates, mineral oil, or animal testing. Ever.

settings.title: shine control face lotion
settings.content:
"Shine Control Face Lotion can be used like a primer. Simply applyin the morning, let dry, and follow with makeup. It keeps the skinfresh and helps makeup last for hours."

-Patti Ramsey Bortoli, Emmy-Award Winning makeup artist currently working on ABC's "Dancing With The Stars"

settings.title: bulgarian rose phytonutrient elixir
settings.content:
"I use this constantly on myself, and on all my clients when I'm settingor refreshing makeup on photo shoots. It's a true lifesaver!"

-Renata Helfman, Celebrity makeup artist and eco beauty expert

settings.title: cucumber ginseng facial mist
settings.content:
"This toner sets makeup beautifully, helping set powder, keep makeupin place, and ensure the cast's skin is always camera-ready."

-Jennifer Turchi, Department Head Makeup Artist of CBS's "How I Met Your Mother"

settings.title: gentle eye makeup remover
settings.content:
"The Gentle Eye Makeup Remover is very gentle and doesn't irritatethe eyes, like most do."

-Tracey Anderson, Department Head Makeup Artist on AMC's "Fear The Walking Dead"

settings.title: lip conditioning balm
settings.content:
"This soothing lip conditioner hydrates lips and adds a natural shine."

-Pamela Lljubo-Obrien, Department Head Makeup Artist on NBC's "Community"

settings.title: moisture magnet
settings.content:
"I add this to the HD foundation for the cast, as it gives a glow without looking greasy. It also brings life to foundation, giving it a more natural, sheer finish."

-Jennifer Turchi, Department Head Makeup Artist of CBS's "How I Met Your Mother"

settings.title: sweet almond exfoliating crme
settings.content:
"This exfoliating cleanser lifts dry skin while adding moisture, a must-have for the cast to achieve radiance and avoid dullness from frequent makeup applications."

-Pamela Lljubo-Obrien, Department Head Makeup Artist on NBC's "Community"

settings.title: Travelers and Explorers Love LATHER
settings.content: Remember that unforgettable shower you had at the hotel on vacation? Well, chances are, our products shared the shower with you. And while the packaging may look a little different, below you can explore the products that left you feeling refreshed and happy from head to toe.

Take Me Back.

Mint. Thyme. Yuzu. Bergamot. Bamboo. Lemongrass. Lavender. Lime. Prepare to breathe it in again.

Five Star Shower

You loved your vacation, almost as much as you loved what was in that shower. Youre in luck.

Creamy Meets Dreamy.

Vacations dont come around often enough. Re-live your favorite experience now.

An Explorer at Heart.

Our founder, Emilie Hoyt, had a hunch that her frequent lifelong migraines were partly triggered by synthetic perfumes and artificial ingredients in skincare and shampoos.

Little did she know that her explorer heart, natural curiosity, and deep love for nature and essential oils would become the first steps on a journey towards creating LATHER, a pioneering, head to toe wellness brand loved by loyal customers all over the world.
